name: Classic GBA Block Puzzle
description:
Classic GBA Block Puzzle game, the most interesting puzzle block Mania game ever, classic gba element shapes in your smart brain and you childhood.

It inherit the soul of classic puzzle game: simple, fun, mentally, attractive and suitable for all ages.


It's also a simple way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp and foresight for next one. You just pull the cubes on the bottom and put it in to the table!

HOW TO PLAY: just pull the cubes on the board and put it in to the screen?
- Drop blocks to create and destroy full lines on the screen vertically or horizontally.
- Place the pieces into board and keep your mind foresight for next one, freeing up space for new pieces.
- If there are no space for anyone given blocks below the board, it means failing.
- Open your brain and think more about the next step, even next next next ... blocks.

FEATURES:
-Once you start, you'll be hooked, addictive match game.
-Stunning blocks, simple UI, classic GBA puzzle game.
-Super Easy to play but need long-time training in master level.
-The most classic gba element combined with the newest elimination puzzle gameplay.
-A ranking board, Challenge with your friends, and get the higher score.
-You can play this brain puzzle game for any time,anywhere, pleasurable no wifi.

Let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game to keep the blocks from filling the screen.
